text:
The First Collection, TON of Memes, is now live.

If you hold 0.01% of any featured memecoins ([DUREV,](https://x.com/PovelDurev) [REDO,](https://x.com/redotoken) or [FISH](https://x.com/tonfish_tg)) you can mint this pack for free.

Start collecting inside Telegram on the Fuse mini-app.

[https://t.me/fuse](https://t.me/fuse)

What is Fuse?

Fuse is a platform for minting stickers on-chain

Its where your digital life becomes something you actually own.

Think of it like this: instead of just liking, sharing, and scrolling past content that disappears, you can collect digital stickers that represent who you are and what you care about.

Each sticker on Fuse is more than just a picture. It's a piece of culture you can keep forever. Whether it's from your favorite Web2 brand, a Web3 project you believe in, or a creator whose work speaks to you.

We're built on TON, which means everything you collect lives in your wallet, not on a platform that could change the rules tomorrow.  Your collection travels with you wherever you go.

Fuse isn't about chasing the next trend or filling up your feed with noise. 

We curate collections that matter, from brands and creators who are building something lasting.

Your digital choices should feel intentional, not accidental. That's what we're here for.

Fuse is officially live. 

Explore the Mini App on Telegram now, there might be a surprise waiting for you.

[https://t.me/fuse](https://t.me/fuse)
